resources.string: At Mediconsult, our 360Â° philosophy is an accumulation of observation and practical experience across two decades of consulting and project implementations. We believe complex issues such as asset evaluation, financing and investment, planning development and management systems must be seen holistically as "the whole is more than the sum of its parts".

Today, linkages in healthcare delivery systems are increasingly intersecting - whether between delivery of care, workflow and facility design, between equipment and maintenance planning, between procurement and logistics, or between information systems and management services. It is now almost impossible to look at any dimension of healthcare consulting in isolation. It is essential, therefore, for healthcare needs to be viewed holistically, in order to optimise opportunities, expertise and resources.
